Darkfate::

He smiled pleaced, fight against Hellbeast... The idea sounded 
good... he asked to Zardus. 

"Is this frecuency enough safe to disscus a plan??" he asked "Some 
predacons of Hell Beast's faction are outside my base... and we will 
need aplan to attack them... And I guess that it will be other step 
in our alliance-trade, won't it?"

--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> The message from Zardus played as DarkFate entered the room.
> "I dont know about you, but I want to do this."
> He opens a comm to killfest.
> "You want to fight with the Alliance to take over Hell Beast's 
base?"
> He then opened a comm to Zardus.
> "I'm for this. I am now asking my allies. Please stand by."
> 
> ::Dollen::
> 
> He arrived back at base, and got the trading stuff together.
